result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dylan M Wright

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Dylan M Wright not in court, in custody.  Attorney Corey R. Flynn in court for Dylan M Wright.  Prosecuting attorney Navjot Singh Hira in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Parties are prepared to enter into a deferred prosecution agreement.

Defendant was advised of constitution rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights and entered a plea of GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Stipulation by parties to complaint as a factual basis to sustain the guilty plea.  Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible.  Court found the defendant guilty as charged in the Complaint/Information.  Court WITHHELD entry of judgment of conviction.  Deferred Prosecution Agreement received, signed and filed.
 
Court ordered case adjourned for Review in Branch 17.
Review hearing scheduled for November 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights, Addendum to Plea and Elements, filed.

Attorney Corey R. Flynn in court, defendant Dylan M Wright not in court, in custody.  Navjot Singh Hira appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Matter scheduled for DPA Hearing.  Parties have not entered in a DPA and requests additional hearing date.  Case adjourned, Br. 15.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Attorney Corey R. Flynn in court, defendant Dylan M Wright not in court, in custody.  Julie Knyszek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case in court for a Status Conference.  Defendant has completed the tad evaluation and waiting for the State to draft the dpa document.
State confirms. Court orderd matter adjourned and advises the parties, Effective  July 30, 2022  this calendar will be assigned to Judge JD Watts, Branch 15  in Room 623 of the Courthouse.
Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for August 11, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Corey R. Flynn in court, defendant Dylan M Wright not in court, in custody.  Julie D Knyszek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a status conference. Defense advises the court he has not received an offer and needs additional time to set up a TAD evaluation.
Court ordered matter adjourned back to Branch 19.  Status conference scheduled for July 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Dylan M Wright in court with attorney Corey R. Flynn. Defendant Dylan Wright not in court , in custody. Julie D Knyszek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
HEARING HELD VIA ZOOM/ LIVE STREAMING THROUGH DACAST. Case in court for a Status Conference. 
Defense in receipt of dpa documents and need time to review with his client who is in custody. 
Court ordered matter adjourned back to Branch 19. Status conference scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Corey R. Flynn in court, defendant Dylan M Wright not in court, in custody.  Julie D Knyszek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
HEARING HELD VIA ZOOM/ LIVE STREAMING THROUGH DACAST. Case in court for a Pretrial Conference.
Defense in receipt of discovery and potential dpa offer and request time to review and discuss with the defendant. 
Court ordered matter adjourned back to Branch 19. This hearing will be be held streamed Live through dacast- via Zoom.  Status conference scheduled for May 27, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Pre-trial conference on April 25, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered no contact with Michael W and Austin W
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Dylan M Wright in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Dylan M Wright in custody.  amy E spanczak appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Dylan M Wright appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Ashley, Branch 19. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION. Case is adjourned to Br. 19 for pretrial.
This hearing will be streamed Live through DACAST:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/21a87aec-ffb6-5325-fb81-55812563aa79  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 25, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
